events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for several days and I'm very concerned about the delay.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to reported late shipment and stagnant tracking updates.
Customer service agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery case reported by the customer.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. I'll look into the tracking details for you right now.
Could you please provide your order number and the date you placed the order so I can check with the shipping carrier?
Sure, my order number is 456789 and I placed it on May 25th. I appreciate you helping me investigate this delay.
After checking with the courier, it appears there has been an unexpected delay at the local distribution center. We expect delivery within 3 more days. We will update you promptly.
Thank you for the update. I understand delays happen, and I appreciate you keeping me informed. I'll wait for the delivery over the next few days.
Your order has been delivered successfully, and the delay issue is now considered resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We're reaching out to ensure your delivery arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your shipping delay.
Thank you for your patience throughout this process. As your order has been delivered and the issue resolved, we'll now close this case.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather feedback on your experience regarding the delayed delivery and how our team assisted you.
